sentences.english: The prospect of billion-year storage is fascinating and a little terrifying.
sentences.chinese: 數據儲存數十億年的願景令人着迷卻又有點可怕。

sentences.english: Also "blast home" to meet the "bull" in foreshadowing the arrival of a new vision.
sentences.chinese: 也爲“高爐家”迎接“牛”年的到來鋪墊新的願景。

sentences.english: The exercise merely helps to impress that mental image on your subconscious mind.
sentences.chinese: 體育鍛煉只能幫助你將精神願景印入你的潛意識之中。

sentences.english: JCI has also renewed its emphasis on the JCI Mission and Vision.
sentences.chinese: 世界總會同時更新了對青商任務與青商願景的強調。

sentences.english: DXY is short for lilac garden in Chinese Pinyin.
sentences.chinese: 丁香園的願景是，讓健康更多，讓疾病更少。

sentences.english: The unspeakable visions of the individual.
Achieving them will unquestionably contribute to the vision of a better world.
sentences.chinese: 實現它們將無疑會豐富我們對更美好世界的願景。

sentences.english: Angela and I share common values and compatible visions of the good life.
sentences.chinese: 安琪拉和我分享美好生活的價值觀和共處的願景。

sentences.english: That’s been our vision since taking office.
sentences.chinese: 這是我主政以來大家的共同願景。

sentences.english: Nick shares with his audiences the importance of vision and dreaming big.
sentences.chinese: 尼克同他的聽衆分享了擁有願景和遠大理想的重要性。

sentences.english: “What is the vision for Yahoo” Battelle asks.
sentences.chinese: 伯特立問道，“雅虎的願景是什麼？”

sentences.english: Egypt and Iran are to hold talks with the goal of renewing full diplomatic relations.
sentences.chinese: 埃及與伊朗研商恢復兩國全面外交關係的願景。

sentences.english: At the series of meetings in Cairo, Roosevelt outlined his vision for postwar Asia.
sentences.chinese: 開羅之系列會議中，羅斯福爲戰後之亞洲勾勒願景。

sentences.english: Section 2 presents the vision of IoT.
sentences.chinese: 第2節介紹了物聯網的願景。

definition: to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
variant of 計劃|计划[ji4 hua4]
to create/to bring about/to produce/to set (a record)
to construct (often sth abstract, such as good relations)/to set up/to develop/construction (abstract)/architecture
to extend/to spread/to popularize/generalization/promotion (of a product etc)
to crane one's neck/to await eagerly/to lead/to show the way
to achieve/to implement/to realize/to bring about
